boomerang.name: Boomerang
boomerang.description: Away and back. Hit your enemy twice, if you can. Cooldown reduced 0.75 seconds if you hit.

af.description: After sending a defensive gesture, many units will spawn!
af.name: (A) Strategic Takeover

bf.description: After any defensive gesture, many units will spawn!
bf.name: (B) Strategic Takeover

cf.description: After any defensive gesture, many units will spawn!
cf.name: (C) Strategic Takeover

boomerang1.name: Boomerang
boomerang1.description: Away and back. Hit your enemy twice, if you can. Cooldown reduced 0.75 seconds if you hit.

boom.name: Acolyte Beam
boom.description: Unleash a beam so powerful it can wipe out a full-health enemy in seconds.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, Acolyte Beam will be interrupted.

phase2.description: Teleport to a nearby location. Get close, or get away.

effects.title: Weak
effects.text: For 0.25 seconds after teleporting, you will only deal 25% damage and cannot deal fatal damage.

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: Clears all positive and negative effects.

effects.title: Void recharge
effects.text: Cools down 2x faster when in the void.

infection.description: Follows the enemy. High damage, but only if the enemy doesn't know how to dodge.
